text.tspan: exact filter to be used from several
method provided by all available implementations of filters
resolves (or tells) the exact type (e.g., TypeA) which called the
filter. filter method accepts the class type as a parameter,
making it possible to create a dedicated filtering solution for
method provided by class used for
The owner of types (e.g., TypeA) does not need to know
about how Filter is implemented, only that a method
filter is provided by the class Filter. This owner may be
a middleware vendor, separate from the end customer.
